name: Reading List: Probability and Statistics
body:
## Probabilistic Reasoning
* _Probability Theory: The Logic of Science_ by E. T. Jaynes 
* _Introduction to Probability Models_ (10th Edition) by Sheldon M. Ross
* _Probabilistic Reasoning in Intelligent Systems: Networks of Plausible Inference_ by Judea Pearl
* [_Probabilistic Graphical Models: Principles and Techniques_](http://mitpress.mit.edu/books/probabilistic-graphical-models) by Daphne Koller and Nir Friedman


## Statistics
* _Introduction to the Practice of Statistics_ (7th Edition) by David Moore, George P. McCabe & Bruce Craig
* _Statistics_ (4th Edition) David Freedman & Robert Pisani & Roger Purves
* [_All of Statistics: A Concise Course in Statistical Inference_](http://www.stat.cmu.edu/~larry/all-of-statistics/) by Larry Wasserman
* _Statistical Learning Theory_ by Vladimir N. Vapnik
* _Probability and Statistics_ (4th Edition) by Morris H. Degroot and Mark J. Schervish
* _Introduction to Mathematical Statistics_ (7th Edition) by Robert V. Hogg, Joeseph McKean & Allen T Craig
* [_The Elements of Statistical Learning: Data Mining, Inference, and Prediction_](http://www-stat.stanford.edu/~tibs/ElemStatLearn/) (2nd Edition) by Trevor Hastie, Robert Tibshirani & Jerome Friedman
* [_NIST/SEMATECH e-Handbook of Statistical Methods_](http://www.itl.nist.gov/div898/handbook/index.htm) by NIST
* _Statistical Pattern Recognition_ (3rd Edition) by Andrew R. Webb, Keith D. Copsey

## Bayesian Statistics
* [_Standford: Stats 270/370: A Course in Bayesian Statistics_](http://www-stat.stanford.edu/~sabatti/) by Chiara Sabatti
* _Bayesian Statistics: An Introduction_ (3rd edition) by Peter M. Lee
* _Bayesian Data Analysis_ (2nd Edition) by Andrew Gelman, John B. Carlin, Hal S. Stern & Donald B. Rubin
* _Understanding Computational Bayesian Statistics_ by William M. Bolstad
* _A First Course in Bayesian Statistical Methods_ by Peter D. Hoff

## Markov Chain Monte Carlo
* [_An Introduction to MCMC for Machine Learning_](http://www.cs.princeton.edu/courses/archive/spr06/cos598C/papers/AndrieuFreitasDoucetJordan2003.pdf) by Christophe Andrieu, Nando de Freitas, Arnaud Doucet & Michael I. Jordan
